title: A REFINING MEMBER AND HUB WITH SPLINES WITH A WEAR INDICATOR
abstract: A hub and a member, the member having a central opening. The hub is received in the member central opening. The hub has a center, and a hub axis through the center. The hub also has a splined exterior with a plurality of splines, each spline having a spline surface, and the member central opening has internal splines that engage with the hub splined exterior. At least one of the hub splines has a wear indicator, the wear indicator comprising a surface mark that extends along a portion of the spline surface in the same direction as the hub axis.

motivations: There is a need for a hub and member design that allows for easy detection of wear and tear on the splines.
objectives: Design a hub and member with splines that includes a wear indicator to facilitate maintenance and inspection.
methods: Create a hub with a splined exterior and a member with internal splines that engage with the hub.
Incorporate a wear indicator on at least one of the hub splines, comprising a surface mark that extends along a portion of the spline surface.
results: Provide a clear visual indication of wear on the splines, enabling timely maintenance and reducing the risk of failure.
llama_json.research_subject: Design of a hub and member with splines and a wear indicator

motivations: There is a need for a mechanism to indicate wear on the splines of a hub and member system.
objectives: Design a hub and a member with a wear indicator on at least one of the hub splines.
methods: Incorporate a surface mark on the spline surface of the hub that extends along a portion of the spline surface in the same direction as the hub axis.
results: Provide a hub and member system with a wear indicator to monitor and manage wear and tear.
openai_json.research_subject: Design of a hub and member system with a wear indicator on splines

motivations: There is a need to monitor wear in splined mechanical connections to ensure proper maintenance and prevent failure.
objectives: Develop a hub and member assembly with integrated wear indicators on the spline surfaces to enable visual inspection of wear progression.
methods: Design a hub with external splines and a member with internal splines that engage together, incorporating surface marks on the spline surfaces that serve as wear indicators.
results: Enable direct visual assessment of spline wear without disassembly, improving maintenance efficiency and equipment reliability.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Splined mechanical connection with integrated wear indicator
